articles.title: Meta's 'Efficiency' Layoffs Take a Toll on Employee Productivity - NDTV
articles.description: Meta Platforms Inc. employees received news Wednesday of the final round of previously announced job cuts, which affected thousands of workers in the company's business departments.
articles.content:
Meta, which owns Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp, said the layoffs were necessary to improve efficiency
